entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain inland before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 3.
